typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SalesAmount as double,
		TotalProductCost as double,
		ProductStandardCost as double,
		UnitPriceDiscountPct as boolean,
		ExtendedAmount as double,
		UnitPrice as double,
		OrderQuantity as short,
		SalesTerritoryId as short,
		OrderDate as date,
		ProductId as short,
		SalesOrderLineId as integer,
		Channel as string,
		SalesOrder as string,
		CustomerId as string,
		ResellerId as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	store: 'synapse',
	databaseType: 'spark',
	format: 'table',
	database: 'adworks',
	tableName: 'Sales',
	manifestType: 'manifest') ~> SalesSource
source(output(
		CustomerKey as integer,
		CustomerId as string,
		Customer as string,
		City as string,
		StateProvince as string,
		CountryRegion as string,
		PostalCode as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	store: 'synapse',
	databaseType: 'spark',
	format: 'table',
	database: 'adworks',
	tableName: 'CustomerData',
	manifestType: 'manifest') ~> DimCustomerSource
source(output(
		PostalCode as string,
		CountryRegion as string,
		StateProvince as string,
		City as string,
		Reseller as string,
		BusinessType as string,
		ResellerId as string,
		ResellerKey as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	store: 'synapse',
	databaseType: 'spark',
	format: 'table',
	database: 'adworks',
	tableName: 'Reseller',
	manifestType: 'manifest') ~> DimResellerSource
source(output(
		Channel as string,
		ChannelTypeKey as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	store: 'synapse',
	databaseType: 'spark',
	format: 'table',
	database: 'adworkstarget',
	tableName: 'DimChannel') ~> DimChannelSource
source(output(
		ProductId as short,
		Category as string,
		Subcategory as string,
		Model as string,
		ListPrice as double,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as double,
		Product as string,
		SKU as string,
		ProductKey as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	store: 'synapse',
	databaseType: 'spark',
	format: 'table',
	database: 'adworkstarget',
	tableName: 'DimProduct') ~> DimProductSource
DimCustomerSource select(mapColumn(
		CustomerKey,
		CustomerId_lookup = CustomerId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> DimCustomerSelect
DimResellerSource select(mapColumn(
		ResellerId_lookup = ResellerId,
		ResellerKey
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> DimResellerSelect
DimChannelSource select(mapColumn(
		Channel_lookup = Channel,
		ChannelTypeKey
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DimChannelSelect
SalesSource, DimChannelSelect lookup(Channel == Channel_lookup,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ChannelKeyLookup
ChannelKeyLookup, DimCustomerSelect lookup(CustomerId == CustomerId_lookup,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CustomerKeyLookup
CustomerKeyLookup, DimResellerSelect lookup(ResellerId == ResellerId_lookup,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ResellerKeyLookup
ProductKeyLookup select(mapColumn(
		SalesAmount,
		TotalProductCost,
		ProductStandardCost,
		UnitPriceDiscountPct,
		ExtendedAmount,
		UnitPrice,
		OrderQuantity,
		SalesTerritoryId,
		OrderDate,
		ProductId = SalesSource@ProductId,
		SalesOrderLineId,
		SalesOrder,
		ChannelTypeKey,
		CustomerKey,
		ResellerKey
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select1
DimProductSource select(mapColumn(
		ProductId,
		ProductKey
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DimProductSelect
ResellerKeyLookup, DimProductSelect lookup(SalesSource@ProductId == DimProductSelect@ProductId,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ProductKeyLookup
select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	store: 'synapse',
	databaseType: 'spark',
	format: 'table',
	database: 'adworkstarget',
	tableName: 'FactSales',
	recreate:true,
	manifestType: 'manifest') ~> FactSalesSink
